data.title: Victor Chang Cardiac Research Institute on LinkedIn: Aussie tennis great Todd Woodbridge suffered mild heart attack
data.meta_description: Tennis legend Todd Woodbridge was shocked by his heart attack last week. At 51, he is fit, eats well and is otherwise healthy. He's now urging Australian men‚Ä¶
data.text:
Job opportunities! Our Heart Health Checks are expanding across Australia and reaching a greater number of regional towns than ever. Would you like to join us in supporting the heart health of Australians across the country? Learn more: https://lnkd.in/gPjYTVz #HeartDisease #HeartHealthCheck Anastasia Dounas

Star Scientist Dr Chai Ann (Andy) Ng aims to give patients and families with inherited heart arrhythmias long-hoped-for answers about the cause of their disease. His complex work in our Innovation Centre is helping to improve genetic testing and treatment. Read his story: https://lnkd.in/gUaaa_Th #MedicalResearch #HeartDisease #arrhythmia Jamie Vandenberg

Know who you would take for a five-night stay at a luxury waterfront villa in Queensland's beautiful Whitsundays? Thanks to our generous supporters Yangaro it could be yours to decide! üèñÔ∏èüòçThis opulent getaway is just one of the incredible raffle prizes on offer at our Women Against Heart Disease fundraising lunch on Thursday, August 8. Individual and table tickets now available: https://lnkd.in/g5Uuf4_z #MedicalResearch #HeartDisease #WomensHeartDisease #WomensHealth

Unexplained cardiac death takes the lives of 2,000 Australians every year ‚Äì many without any warning. As Professor Andre La Gerche explains to Nine News, his HEART Lab - supported by the Institute and St Vincent's Institute of Medical Research in Melbourne - is trying to provide answers to families and he‚Äôs hopeful there will be a cure in the future thanks to research https://lnkd.in/gYeaHKfy

üì¢Last callüì¢ Don't miss your chance to recognise a future star scientist at your school. Nominations for the Victor Chang School Science Awards close this Wednesday, July 24. Submit your nomination now: https://lnkd.in/g9HgN2dJ #Science #STEM #Scientist #scientistsofinstagram #instascientist

We were thrilled to host NSW Minister For Medical Research David Harris at the Institute for the launch of the Non-Animal Technologies Network (NAT-Net). We also welcomed fellow founding NAT-Net partners, Children's Medical Research Institute, UNSW, University of Technology Sydney, the University of Wollongong, the University of Newcastle, the University of Sydney and the Hunter Medical Research Institute (HMRI). The network will develop cell-based models to speed drug development, improve patient outcomes, and reduce the number of animals used in medical research. Support for NAT-Net has been provided by the NSW Government through NSW Health‚Äôs Office for Health and Medical Research. Learn more: https://lnkd.in/gQ52hGXb #MedicalResearch Adam Hill Jacek Kolanowski

Diet and exercise can have a big impact on our hearts, but do you know the four other keys to lowering blood pressure? Cardiologist Professor Jason Kovacic shares his expert tips to put you on the road to perfect BP. #HeartDisease #HighBloodPressure #hypertension
